sentences.en: Don't act in haste because someone is giving you an ultimatum.
sentences.cn: 金牛座:不要再犹豫了,对方已经达到最后期限了.

sentences.en: He gave me an ultimatum: either Tom had to leave, or me.
sentences.cn: 他向我发出了最后通牒: 不是汤姆离开, 就是我离开.

sentences.en: Issue an ultimatum -- but be prepared to lose your friends.
sentences.cn: 发 最后通牒,不过你要准备好失去你的朋友.
这简直是赤裸裸的最后通牒!

sentences.en: Listen as she reprimands him and gives him ultimatum.
sentences.cn: 请听卡伦如何斥责他,给他下最后通牒.

sentences.en: Next day the EU summit strengthened their ultimatum.
sentences.cn: 次日，欧盟峰会发出了更加强硬的最后通牒。

sentences.en: Palmer, don't give me an ultimatum, for heaven's sake.
sentences.cn: 巴穆,看在老天的面上, 别给我下最后通谍.

sentences.en: The army issued an ultimatum for all weapons in the city to be surrendered on October 26th.
sentences.cn: 军队发出最后通牒，必须于 10 月 26 日交出该市的全部武器。

sentences.en: The cabinet met today to discuss how to respond to the ultimatum.
sentences.cn: 内阁今天开会商量如何应对这道最后通牒。

sentences.en: The club gave him an ultimatum – either he apologized, or he would be expelled from the team.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部给他下了最后通牒——要么道歉，要么等着被开除出队。

sentences.en: The ultimatum expires at noon tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 最后通牒规定的期限到明天中午截止.

sentences.en: There will be some speeific German ultimatum that would trigger a negotiation rather than a war.
sentences.cn: 德国总会发出最后通牒,从而导致谈判,而不是战争.

sentences.en: They argued on and on, never reaching any ultimatum.
sentences.cn: 他们争论不休, 得不出任何结论.

sentences.en: They delivered an ultimatum to Iraq.
sentences.cn: 他们向伊拉克发出最后通牒.

sentences.en: They issued an ultimatum to the police to rid an area of racist attackers, or they will take the law into their own hands.
sentences.cn: 他们向警方发出了最后通牒，要求肃清整个地区的种族主义暴徒，否则他们将自行采取行动。

sentences.en: This time the proposal was couched as an ultimatum.
sentences.cn: 这一次该提议是以最后通牒的形式提出来的。

words.tran_cn: 最后通牒；最后结论；基本原理

trans.tran_cn: 最后通牒，最后条件，最后结论，基本意义（原理）
trans.tran_en: a threat saying that if someone does not do what you want by a particular time, you will do something to punish them
